issue.title: Init() of GUI System plugin called before rendering engine initialized

content.raw: GUI plugins are no longer System plugins and it looks like the [Load](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/6e6665bf4ea289af724c87372e3d8d98c09aeca8/gazebo/gui/RenderWidget.cc?fileviewer=file-view-default#RenderWidget.cc-298) method is now called after the scene is created (in GLWidget). The GUI plugin examples and tutorials are working. I just tested loading gui plugins from a world file and that also works. so I would say yes, the issue should be fixed
content.html: GUI plugins are no longer System plugins and it looks like the Load method is now called after the scene is created (in GLWidget). The GUI plugin examples and tutorials are working. I just tested loading gui plugins from a world file and that also works. so I would say yes, the issue should be fixed
